inlineStyles.em: font-style: italic; color: rgb(234, 88, 12); font-weight: 500; letter-spacing: 0.8px;
inlineStyles.i: font-style: italic; color: rgb(234, 88, 12); font-weight: 500; letter-spacing: 0.8px;
inlineStyles.u: text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-color: rgb(251, 146, 60); text-underline-offset: 4px; text-decoration-thickness: 2.5px;
inlineStyles.code: font-family: '等线', 'SF Mono', 'Consolas', monospace; font-size: 0.9em; background: rgba(251, 146, 60, 0.12); color: rgb(154, 52, 18); padding: 0.3em 0.65em; border-radius: 8px; border: 1px solid rgba(251, 146, 60, 0.3); font-weight: 500; letter-spacing: 0.5px;
inlineStyles.mark: background: rgba(251, 191, 36, 0.3); padding: 0.2em 0.5em; border-radius: 6px; color: rgb(146, 64, 14); letter-spacing: 0.4px;
inlineStyles.a: color: rgb(234, 88, 12); text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-color: rgba(234, 88, 12, 0.7); text-underline-offset: 3px; letter-spacing: 0.4px;

globalStyles.container: <section style='box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; padding: 32px 28px; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.85; color: rgb(69, 26, 3); font-family: "PingFang SC", "微软雅黑", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Noto Sans CJK SC", sans-serif; letter-spacing: 1px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 237, 213, 0.35) 0%, rgba(254, 215, 170, 0.25) 100%); border-radius: 16px; word-break: break-word;'>{{content}}</section>
